name: A FAIRY WITHOUT WINGS
description:
"A FAIRY WITHOUT WINGS" is a new Gameboy game Developed using ZGB / GBDK for the 2nd "Retroacción international contest" of 2019  https://www.retroaccion.org/concurso-internacional-de-programacion-de-videojuego...

You are a tooth fairy who was born without wings.
When she collects enough teeth, she gains the power to shoot lightning, but a simple contact will make her teleport because she doesn't control her powers completely.
